tokens.resolved_gloss: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
tokens.translation: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, vehemence, i.e. (with or without preposition) vehemently; by implication, wholly, speedily, etc. (often with other words as an intensive or superlative; especially when repeated)
tokens.translation: properly, vehemence, i.e. (with or without preposition) vehemently; by implication, wholly, speedily, etc. (often with other words as an intensive or superlative; especially when repeated)

tokens.resolved_gloss: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
tokens.translation: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
